briefTitle: A Double-blind, Randomized, Multicenter, Cross-over Study to Compare the Effect of Creon N and Creon® on Fat Digestion in Subjects ≥ 12 Years of Age With Pancreatic Exocrine Insufficiency Due to Cystic Fibrosis
officialTitle: A Double-blind, Randomized, Multicenter, Cross-over Study to Compare the Effect of Creon N and Creon® on Fat Digestion in Subjects ≥ 12 Years of Age With Pancreatic Exocrine Insufficiency Due to Cystic Fibrosis
conditions: Pancreatic Exocrine Insufficiency Due to Cystic Fibrosis
summary: maldigestion of dietary macronutrients (pancreas not producing enough enzymes for digestion of fat, sugars and proteins) in Cystic Fibrosis
